issues.economy: Labour's plan would amount to a 5% rise in council tax.
issues.health: Crawley hospital with the Shadow Health Minister: 'Regardless of the NHS background we all rely, I believe Crawley to be reliable and I really think our local A&e and maternity back. Our needs hospital in Redhill has received another poor official report.'

housing.content: The retiring Labour MP for Crawley rented a second home at public expenses in London just 30 miles from Crawley for several years. I don't think that's right and I promise not to do the same if re-elected.

quotes.text: After patrolling Crawley with local Police on Friday night, Henry Smith said: 'We are lucky to have such dedicated officers but they need more support to tackle anti-social behaviour. They want to be out in the community, not form-filling.'

'Henry Smith, chairman of the South East Strategic Leaders, covering nine million residents, said that the government's extra demand could cost the average Â£100 million. Labour's plan would amount to a 5% rise in council tax.'

images.caption: After patrolling Crawley with local Police on Friday night, Henry Smith said: 'We are lucky to have such dedicated officers but they need more support to tackle anti-social behaviour. They want to be out in the community, not form-filling.'

Crawley hospital with the Shadow Health Minister: 'Regardless of the NHS background we all rely, I believe Crawley to be reliable and I really think our local A&e and maternity back. Our needs hospital in Redhill has received another poor official report.'

The retiring Labour MP for Crawley rented a second home at public expenses in London just 30 miles from Crawley for several years. I don't think that's right and I promise not to do the same if re-elected.
